name: bool
role nam: role automatically inherits privileges of roles it is a member o

name: bool
role nam: role can update system catalogs directly. (even a superuser cannot do this unless this column is true

name: bool
role nam: role can log in. that is, this role can be given as the initial session authorization identifie

name: bool
role nam: role is a replication role. that is, this role can initiate streaming replication and set/unset the system backup mode using pg_start_backup and pg_stop_backu

name: int4
role nam: for roles that can log in, this sets maximum number of concurrent connections this role can make. -1 means no limit

name: timestamptz
role nam: password expiry time (only used for password authentication); null if no expiratio

name: text[]
role nam: role-specific defaults for run-time configuration variable
